website_summaries.verdict: Cover can be added and removed quickly, thanks to elastic on the bottom and a rear zipper.
pros: Material provides both sun and water resistance for your golf cart
Available in either a two-person or four-person golf cart design
Uses rear air vents to keep air moving through the golf cart when the cover is on
Features an elastic cord on the bottom to ensure a tight fit
cons: Only fits certain models of golf carts
Thin material may not last a long time

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I always feel it is very important to read all the reviews on the product prior to purchasing. I found with this product it was everything it said it would be and more we are completely happy. It was very easy to put on our four seater golf cart the quality of this product is excellent. I would not hesitate to purchase again in the future if need be and would recommend this cover to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, fits well.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, fits well and keeps the weather off of my golf cart. Love the zipper on the back, makes it easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof. Attractive tan color.Material light and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 4-person cover for my 2-person cart and it's a perfect fit for my needs -- easy to put on and take off and the elastic corners give it a tight fit so it won't blow off. Material light and durable.Waterproof. Attractive tan color. Priced right. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: George B

customer_reviews.title: Not a permanent solution
customer_reviews.text: The cover lasted about a year-and-a-half before ripping. It has been taken off and put back on the cart less than 20 times. Material has degraded to the point where you can basically push your finger through it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Well Covered!
customer_reviews.text: This product can be installed by one person. Though it has an elastic band at the bottom, I would recommend incorporating something 2/3rds of the way up to take up the slack. This is especially helpful in high wind areas. I currently use bungee cords but am fearful the a hook may tear into the material as a result of the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cantu

customer_reviews.title: perfect cover for our golf cart
customer_reviews.text: bought this over a year ago to cover our golf cart at the campground. We camp on weekends so it keeps our cart covered every week mon-fri and covered it through the winter. Now well into a 2nd summer and it has weathered very well, provided protection, held up so it is obviously quality material and construction. Very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: This golf Cart cover fits better then the one I bought from the dealer
customer_reviews.text: This golf Cart cover fits better then the one I bought from the dealer. It's very easy to put on and take off. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM J. CASTILLO

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: What a piece oh junk. Zipper broken upon arrival. Poor quality and color was definitely not tan, as described. Contacted company immediately !
customer_reviews.author: Moonley

customer_reviews.title: Material too thin
customer_reviews.text: It fell apart within 2 years. The fabric was too thin. The good thing was that I did buy the Square Trade protection plan with it and got most of my money back. Would be OK if the golf cart wasn't out in the Arizona sun all day. I think the sun was just too much for it.
customer_reviews.author: SG from Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Purchasedd this cover in Jan of 2014, covered golf ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchasedd this cover in Jan of 2014, covered golf cart under an aluminum carport roof. When we returned in Oct the cover had a few holes in it. I ckd for any shaprt objects on the cart, found none. The cover was tied with nylong cord horizontally and vertically to prevent wind from blowing it off. Sever people in our park have the same cover, tied the same way and they had no defects at all. Pretty unhappy with this purchase. By the time I return it and pay return postage, then wait for seller to decide if they will make good on the product, it juus seems too much of a waste of more time and money.
customer_reviews.author: rosie4868

customer_reviews.title: Great quality cover, but hard to use by yourself
customer_reviews.text: This cover appears to be made really well. It's just that it's hard to put over my golf cart by myself. Perhaps if I were a foot taller it would have been easier. The elastic at the bottom is also pretty tight, which contributed to the difficulty I had getting it on myself. Otherwise, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Karmachelle

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Yamaha better. Yamaha has a Madjax Genesis 250 rear seat
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 4 seater 2014 G29 Yamaha Drive and my 4 seater 2004 Club Car Precedent. Fits the Yamaha better. Yamaha has a Madjax Genesis 250 rear seat, Club Car has a DoubleTake Max 5 rear seat. Very thin, not as heavy or durable feeling as my Formosa cover.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write this review to first determine durability. The fabric tore after one year. My golf cart is left outside for 6mos. The wind ended its use. Better to look for something with more mils/plys
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: fits 2-seater cart nicely
customer_reviews.text: the cover fit my 2-seater cart very nicely - would not fit a four seater at all - the only complaint I have is - the snap at the bottom of the zipper does not stay snapped and therefore, the zipper does not stay down - a hook and grommet at the bottom would work - I have to put a mini bungee strap through the zipper pull and hook it under the back of the cart on one of the bolts underneath
customer_reviews.author: wepco

customer_reviews.title: Great All Weather Product
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for more than 6 months. Great product hasn't faded nor torn. Additionally the zipper and snap is still in tact. This product is being used 24hrs a day in all weather conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnathan

customer_reviews.title: Good price - but not high quality
customer_reviews.text: Very thin. Lasted one season. Gave 3 stars because it was cheap. Started to rip at the one year point. It was on the golf car for around 9 months in all kinds of weather. Stays on cart well.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cover for my older golf cart
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove. My golf cart is in a garage but this cover helps with dust control and also keeps people from opening doors and banging the side of the cart. For me, I needed a second person to help put it on. It is being used on a 1998 DS Club Car.
customer_reviews.author: CarolB

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, but does not fit my 2016 EzGo TXT 2 seater. Can not return it as I am leaving tomorrow and no time to get a different one. No grommets to secure it, and can’t zipper rear as it is too small!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Crossley

customer_reviews.title: Easy on, easy off.
customer_reviews.text: Easy on, easy off...does the trick for us. Has enough room that makes it breathable.
customer_reviews.author: M Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Follow vendor’s specs.  We made the mistake of using a review to make sure about the size since we wern’t sure.  Incorrect info.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced one we have used for 3 yrs. Fairly easy to get on by yourself. Very easy with 2 people. We hose off the pollen and have never had to wash it. Fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis E.

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 of these for my golf carts. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my golf carts. The manufacturer claims these will fit a four seater ezgo golf cart. These will not fit. Way to small.
customer_reviews.author: K B.

customer_reviews.title: A great golf cart cover
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Classic Cart Cover. It fits my Yamaha G1 perfectly. The last one lasted about four years. I am extremely satisfied with this product. It’s the best value on the market as far as I’m concerned. It’s lightweight, waterproof and easy to install. It protects my cart in all weather conditions. To extend it’s life, I cover it with a tarp during north snowy winter months in the Pacific Northwest.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits our little Cricket SX 3 golf cart pretty good. Holds up nicely to Florida weather conditions for over one year. It’s kept outside.
customer_reviews.author: IrishlasRN

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the storage bag???
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover but did not come with bag to store in! Bought 2 and neither one came with bag!! Will you send me bag???
customer_reviews.author: Olae

customer_reviews.title: Good fit on 4 seater
customer_reviews.text: Great fit on a Yamaha four seater. Quality construction that seems good for the money you pay. Doesn't fade to bad in the sun which is nice of course. Pros: Good fit Elastic bottom Cons: A little light duty
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Koehler

customer_reviews.title: Good golf cart cover
customer_reviews.text: Great cover for our golf cart. We keep ours outdoors, so this provides great protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect solution to our dilemma. Bought a golf cart but no room in the garage. Considered a shed but saw this great protective cover that actually matches our house. It completely covers and draws together on the bottom. Easy on and off. Good quality. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Janet A. Breit

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover. Fits great and has held up for 2 or 3 years so far (can't remember how long we have had it.) with no signs of wear other than being a little dirty from being outside all year in Michigan. Holding up through all seasons so far. Great product...great price.
customer_reviews.author: A.K.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy to use and good cover for cart
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a six year old cover which had fallen apart. While some reviewers indicate problems with the cover not being waterproof, I found this just the opposite. After a heavy thunderstorm, my cart was dry inside. I was also pleased to discover how easy it was for one person to put the cover on the cart as well as to take it off. I have a 2 person cart and order the 2 person version. It fits well and actually covers down to the tires. I recommend the cover.
customer_reviews.author: A2Bill

customer_reviews.title: Covers great. The first gust of wind took it up ...
customer_reviews.text: Covers great. The first gust of wind took it up in the trees. Plan to tie and weight it down if it’s outside or in an open shed.
customer_reviews.author: Harry 33

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Price
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd cart cover I have purchase in 12 years. This product fights the outdoor elements and keeps my golf cart clean. The cover is easy to use and I recommend it to anyone looking for protection and security for their cart.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: A PERFICT FIT!
customer_reviews.text: Is everything they say and fits exactly like the picture, even works with my trailer hitch still on the car. I have an Ez-Go with a lift kit on it. Easy to handle and protects it very well. It lasted about two years and then I ordered another. High wind area and it tore in a few places. Would LOVE IT if it came with optional heavier material for next time.
customer_reviews.author: Thom & Sue McClinton

customer_reviews.title: with the name on the front it is easy to quickly determine how to position the cover over ...
customer_reviews.text: exceeded my expectations. with the name on the front it is easy to quickly determine how to position the cover over the cart and just slide it on. also the zipper is of a higher quality, more substantial and the snap is a great assist in closing the rear. just close the snap and you can then easily pull down the zipper
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Can not handle Nebraska winds/weather.....
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted from March till October, in Nebraska. Shredded and fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not quite tall enough for my Columbia cart. Tight ...
customer_reviews.text: not quite tall enough for my Columbia cart. Tight fit to cover the front and rear bumpers, leaving the Wheels and floor of the cart exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Youdoo2

customer_reviews.title: Has endured the spring and summer season at the lakes. Still looks like new!
customer_reviews.text: We have been very happy with our purchase. We have a lake cottage where our golf cart is most of the time. Apart from securing the cover with a large bungie cord just to secure it in heavy winds, this cover meets all our expectations. We have recommended this same cover to several of our neighbors. For the price, you just can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Gayla Baer

customer_reviews.title: Good cover for the price my third in ten yrs.
customer_reviews.text: We are on our third one of these in the last 10 years They last about 3-4 years Good cover
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Covered the cart well. We leave our cart outside so the top got dirty and it didn't scrub off as easily as I'd hoped, but in the scheme of things, that doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon King

customer_reviews.title: good fit and price.
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly and it is 1/2 the price that the local dealer wanted to charge me. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald J. Lipchik

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and take off even with one person
customer_reviews.author: mom723

customer_reviews.title: Great golf cart cover.
customer_reviews.text: I waited until I had used this cover for over the winter season before I reviewed the product. I live in the Deep South so often times the sun makes covers brittle. This cover has not turned brittle. Sometimes it is a pain to put on since I am short, but only takes a couple minutes more than a taller person would take. Keep the golf cart clean and no leaf build up over the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2010 ez go rxv with a madjax backseat kit perfectly. Nothing sticks out but the bottom half of the tires. It's weathered several storms and high Midwest winds like a champ
customer_reviews.author: Cody Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: ...but not made for carts with a fold up/down seat. Too small.
customer_reviews.author: aaluck

customer_reviews.title: Golf art covered
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly, quality what you would expect for the price. Serves our purpose....is not waterproof, covers the 4 person cart well.....our old cover had stretched out and faded from the sun. This fabric seems more resistant to both. We are very careful when taking it off or putting it back on...seems a bit fragile. But for the $ in a few years we can toss it and buy new.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Stone

customer_reviews.title: Better description of item. One does not fit all.
customer_reviews.text: Material. Didn’t fit my unit as advertised. Length was too small. Returned item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Material is good, fairly easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4 person lifted cart with a short roof. I put it on for the first time today, expecting a lot of rain. Wear, tear and protection remains to be seen. The fit wasn't exactly as expected. The cover is made for a normal, not lifted, long top cart. It covers just about all of the cart, comes to the top of the wheels. Material is good, fairly easy to put on, easier with 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Bergeron

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits our EZGO TXT 4 passenger cart perfectly. Easy to put on and the vent holes helps to keep air moving. Material seems to be very durable but of course because it is new we don't now how it weathers.
customer_reviews.author: WH

customer_reviews.title: golf cart cover
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, i order it and about a week later, it arrived. My wife has a 2 seater club car and it fits perfectly. It has elestic trim and a zipper and snap for the rear, and when not in use it fits into a attached pouch. The rear corners have a cone shape vents, and covers the whole cart and most of the tires. 1 person can install it , but 2 people makes it easier. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: gas guy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is our third one for we have two carts. The first one lasted over three years in all the extreme weather in Missouri. We find them great for keeping the cart clean and dry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Golf cart cover.
customer_reviews.text: I cover my golf cart when we come North for the summer, I will know more as to how it held-up over the summer when we return.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald L Rote

customer_reviews.title: Not made for outdoor storage
customer_reviews.text: Does not keep rain off the golf cart at all. If it is windy, it will blow right off. We had to secure it with clamps to keep it on.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Konya

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy fold up for storage
customer_reviews.text: Works like as expected. Self contained folding bag that you wont loose or get blown away.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Boy RV

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit, Good Material
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover because the cart was going to be outside for a few weeks. It fits very well, with good material that is waterproof to some degree as it did very well during several serious rain storms.
customer_reviews.author: George B.

customer_reviews.title: Decent cover
customer_reviews.text: Fits the cart well but needs straps to keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: jim muller

customer_reviews.title: You may want to consider trying a different golf cart cover.
customer_reviews.text: this item discolored, held a large algae spot on top and ripped 2 months after the warranty expired. so it lasted about 14 months. Have had cheaper covers that held up better so I would not replace a cover with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Drrick1999

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. A little smaller then the one I had but it still fits my EZ-GO TXT
customer_reviews.author: IT dude

customer_reviews.title: Generous size and perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put on and seems to be a nice quality material. It covers my golf cart but not over the tires like the picture shows. With harsh Minnesota winters, I will have to wait until Spring to see if the material makes it through a winter. So far, I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover and was so happy with the cost. other options were at least $75 to $90 dollars
customer_reviews.author: kathy creason

customer_reviews.title: I've used these covers before, and they keep the cart pretty clean and protected.
customer_reviews.text: My cart is stored outdoors, where it is subjected to temperature extremes and rain. The covers keep it looking good, for an old Yamaha, and it is well protected.
customer_reviews.author: Jill D

customer_reviews.title: Great cover, very durable, lightweight with breathable vents.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is exactly what I expected. this is a replacement for one I purchased many years ago. This cover protects my golf cart 24/7/360 (except when I'm using the golf cart on some days spring thru early fall. Very robust cover, very lightweight, and fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: John from Belvidere, NJ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Covers my golf cart just fine. Good price, good shipping time, about a week. (not on prime).
customer_reviews.author: HappygoLucky

customer_reviews.title: good cover that fits well
customer_reviews.text: The cover fits very well and appears to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Wood

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Ez on and off. Works and covers all on my ezgo The Beast. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Piss..D

customer_reviews.title: I also have 18" wheels and a 3" lift and it still fit although doesn't cover all the way to ground like pictured - stops halfway on wheels
customer_reviews.text: Fit my club car with back seat perfectly. I also have 18" wheels and a 3" lift and it still fit although doesn't cover all the way to ground like pictured - stops halfway on wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Harrell

customer_reviews.title: The first one was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this cover and it did not fit my 2 seater club car. The snap would not hold. This the second time I ordered this cover. The first one was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen conarroe

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my club car with flip seat on the back and it fits perfectly. I keep the cart stored outside in a campground which is fairly dusty. This cover keeps it clean and is waterproof too. It is easy to put on and fits great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof. Great dust cover but anywhere the cover is in contact water seeps through, drips down the inside and pools in the hem. Might be great in dry climates or for metal/plastic but not for the wooden trailer I bought it for. I'm using a plastic tarp under this cover. It will keep out dirt /dust and it was inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: jgullam

customer_reviews.title: Works good enough.
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed mine with tent waterproofing from Wal-Mart. seems to make it last longer and helps repel water.
customer_reviews.author: David Y.

customer_reviews.title: installation was easy and the cover fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: delivery was prompt, installation was easy and the cover fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mike J

customer_reviews.title: Good cover for a good price
customer_reviews.text: It fits good, but I don't think we got a different back seat, it doesn't fit perfectly around the back. All in all it's good material, easy to put on, easy to take off.
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: Cover looks good good material Light weight It does not go all ...
customer_reviews.text: Cover looks good good material Light weight It does not go all the way to The ground and cover wheels like the picture shows Just barely covers the body of my 1996 ezgo cart I wanted it to cover wheels
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. First one lasted almost 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and construction. I have no problem putting on by myself. Carts is lifted with knobby ties and has back seat.
customer_reviews.author: Adam D

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Does its job well, no complaints. Easy to use, keeps water ou. Nuff said
customer_reviews.author: Charles Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Cart Cover
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for a really nice golf cart cover. Water resistant & easy to put on the golf cart. I love the elastic bands around the base it really helps to secure the cover & we live where there is a lot of windy days.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Roberts

customer_reviews.title: so good. We've had some terrible weather this summer and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. We've had some terrible weather this summer and this has held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Filmdoc2001

customer_reviews.title: Good cover for Cart
customer_reviews.text: Could be a bit bigger. But it does fix the golf cart and stays on even during a very windy storm. Keeps the rain off, and that is the purpose we bought if for. East to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: R. Young

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, but time will tell sitting out in the Florida Sun.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent V.

customer_reviews.title: Super cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Use it on a club car golf ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Use it on a club car golf cart with a lift kit. We leave it outside at our lake spot. Would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: tnggirl99

customer_reviews.title: Quality looks to be good. It more than met expectations for the price
customer_reviews.text: Quality looks to be good. It more than met expectations for the price. Will see how it holds up over time, have just had 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: K&G_Tn

customer_reviews.title: Easy-On
customer_reviews.text: We could not have asked for a better cover for our golf cart. The quality is very good and it's easy to put on. The only thing it does not do is give you a better score, but I'm sure they are working on that. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to take care of their cart.
customer_reviews.author: Beedee

customer_reviews.title: Value added priduct
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for warm weather cover. MAY not stand wind and rains when winter comes. We will see.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great quality cover for our cart
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality cover for our cart. We used it through the winter and it is still in perfect condition. It should last for many years while keeping our golf cart in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Haley

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this cover. Great cover for the price and fast shipment! Holds up well in high winds and rainy weather. My cart stays outside and this cover keeps it very well protected.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit with treat seat
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our golf cart but didn't realize it would not fit with a rear seat.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Geerdes

customer_reviews.title: so good. Great price
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Great price, and so far, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Des

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great product for the price but it did not come with tie downs.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores R.

customer_reviews.title: fits snug, thought the material would be a little ...
customer_reviews.text: fits snug, thought the material would be a little thicker, we'll see how it holds up to the Arizona weather.
customer_reviews.author: Barry McMillin

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cover so we could park our golf cart outside and get our vehicle in the garage during the summer heat here in AZ. The cover fits perfectly and is lightweight. We are going to clip some type of weights around the bottom to hold it down because there were several windy days that it did blow off. For the price though, it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: kstoho

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my EZ Go
customer_reviews.text: First one lasted 7 years in Florida sun. Perfect fit for my EZ Go.
customer_reviews.author: DrDon

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Product is falling apart after a few months being out doors. Literally ripping because it has become so brittle.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Freg

customer_reviews.title: GREAT COVER FOR GOLF CART
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice cover for my golf cart. I like the fact that it fits around the bottom so that most little creatures cannot go up under there. It also keeps out bumblebee droppings and dirt dobbers. :-)
customer_reviews.author: The Shadow

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new cover for Sid! It fits perfectly and looks awesome!! Sid is our golf cart we use at our campsite with our RV.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This cover is very well made, easy to put on and completely covers my cart. I have not taken it off yet and tried to store it in the attached bag. I'm guessing this might be the only thing I have trouble with.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyC

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: fits well over my four seat golf cart. The material is good and the zipper and button are sturdy. This should last as long as the previous one did, years...
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Mine is a 4 pasenger Club Car, but the ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine is a 4 pasenger Club Car, but the purchased Classic cover was a too tight fit. However, material is allegedly woven polyester. Hope it lasts more than a year with our Caribbean sun hitting daily!
customer_reviews.author: Oscar F. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great  Price
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to us it this year yet but will next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and relatively easy to get on
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and the air vent helps make it easier to got on. Would definitely order another if this ever gets damaged.
customer_reviews.author: falcon46

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Our cover is over a year old now and is still in great condition. Our cart is not kept in the direct sun. All the elastic bottom is surviving the Arizona heat very well, still looks and feels new. Seems to be good quality and easy to use. Will buy another when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

product_meta.title: Classic Accessories Fairway Golf Cart Easy-On Cover, Tan, Fits Club Car Precedent, Yamaha Drive & EZ Go
product_meta.description: 72402 Size: Two - Person Car Features: -Protects any two - or four - passenger golf car from sun, weather damage and dirt.-Handy rear zipper for easy entry and installation.-Rear air vents reduce wind lofting and inside moisture.-Integrated stuff sack.-Tough fabric treated for maximum water resistance and repellency.-Weather Protected fabric won't stretch or shrink. Color/Finish: -Weather Protected, Sand colored vinyl. Warranty: -One year warranty.
feature_bullets: Easy-on cover designed for 2-person golf carts
Made of tough fabric treated for water-resistance
Rear air vents reduce wind lofting and moisture buildup
Rear zipper for easy entry and installation; elastic bottom hem
Includes integrated stuff stack; 1-year manufacturer's warranty
